description:
Sard Wonder Antibacterial Laundry Sanitiser with Eucalyptus Oil - removes 99.9% of bacteria. Proudly made in Australia. 1.5L

Dermatologically tested, Proudly made in Australia, Sard Wonder Antibacterial Laundry Sanitiser with Eucalyptus Oil helps protect you and your family by removing 99.9% of germs, leaving your laundry hygienically clean*. It also helps remove odours, & is effective in Cold Water too! 

It is ideal for towels, bed linen, socks, underwear and sweaty sports clothes. Sard Wonder Laundry Sanitiser, your ally against bacteria! 

It is suitable for Front & Top loaders, as well as for hand washing.  

*Tested on E.Coli & S.Aureus

Sard Wonder Laundry Sanitiser - proudly made in Australia

Dermatologically tested and and effective from 20 degrees

Sard Wonder Antibacterial Laundry Sanitiser with Eucalyptus Oil helps protect you and your family by removing 99.9% of germs, leaving your laundry hygienically clean*.

It is ideal for towels, bed linen, socks, underwear and sweaty sports clothes. Sard Wonder Laundry Sanitiser, your ally against bacteria! 

It is suitable for Front & Top loaders, as well as for hand washing.
name: Sard Laundry Liquid Sanitiser Antibacterial Disinfectant 1.5l
